subject: from the desk of:
body:
from the desk of:
Deaconess Brenda Mathew
WIFE TO A LATE MINISTER OF GOD,
Payment of $18Million Donation Fund in your name:
Good day to you my beloved in the Lord,
 How is everything going with you and your family? This message might come to you as a surprise, However, it was all just my urgent needs for a partner, That made me contact you for this urgent transaction for the Work of God Almighty.
 My name is (Mrs. Brenda Mathew) from United States of America, I'm a widow suffering from Kidney problem and Stroke, which denied me a child as a result, I may not last till next two months according to my doctor report, I'm married to late Pastor Jackson Mathew, And we were married for many years without any issue of a child before his death, I'm 68 years old woman and I have some funds which I inherited from my late husband the sum of (18 Million Dollars) which I needed a very honest and God fearing person who will claim the funds from the 
Wells Fargo Bank of America and use the funds for work of God Affair donation in the house of God Almighty, like propagating the good news of God and to endeavor God worshiping place and help less-privileged, .
I found your profile and I decided to contact you for the donation work of God Affair, Please if you know that you can not afford to carry out this project by all means in the name of our Lord God as a believer in Christ Jesus please do not respond back to this email.
According to my doctor report, I don't need any telephone communication in this regards because of my health condition, The reason why taking this bold decision is because my husband's relatives are not Christians and I don't want my family head to earned money to be misused by unbelievers, I don't want a situation where this Fund will be used in an ungodly manner.
I am not afraid of death hence I know that I am going to be in the bosom of the Lord Almighty, Exodus! 14 VS 14 says that the lord will fight my case and I shall hold my peace, I will like you to understand that my contact with you is a divine direction from God Almighty after all my fasting and prayers.
There after God did opened my eyes to the book of Ecclesiastes 6,verses 1 & 2.Read this scripture and you will understand that there are many people in this world that God gave the grace to acquire wealth yet God did not give them the grace to enjoy the wealth, I happened to fall into the same category now it is the wish of God When God revealed to me to use my wealth to do his work in his kingdom.
I understood that God was testing me like He tested Abraham and other men of God, Abraham needed a child and God asked him to use his only son Isaac for sacrifice, Abraham was faithful and obeyed the Lord Jesus Christ, And God made him the father of many nations, Please if you will use this fund as I stated in this letter then direct your reply immediately, Get back to me if you are interested so that I will lead you to WELLS FARGO Bank in Chicago, where this fund was deposited by my lat husband Pastor Jackson  Mathew  , for you to retrieve the funds in your name as the next of kin for work of God Affair, I will stop here until I hear from you soonest.
 
Please kindly contact me back with your Below Information.
 1.) YOUR NAMES IN FULL AND GOING PHONE NUMBER
 2.)THE NAME OF YOUR COUNTRY OF ORIGIN
3.)YOUR OCCUPATION PRESENTLY
4.)YOUR AGE
 5.)YOUR MARITAL
Thanks,
Yours Faithfully
Deaconess Brenda Mathew

subject: Re: from the desk of:
body:
Hello Deaconess Brenda Mathew,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm deeply moved by your story and your dedication to the work of God. It's truly inspiring to see such faith and commitment, especially in times of personal hardship.

I'm curious about the project you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about it? What kind of work does it involve? How can one contribute to the cause?

Also, I'd like to know more about how you came across my profile and why you believe I could be a good fit for this mission. 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Cornelia
